On the Spring Equinox at the *bu* hour, write in white on yellow paper and ingest it. Strike the teeth twelve times and softly recite the incantation:

*"Great radiance illumines the central heavens,
Bright rosy clouds adorn the golden chamber.
Jade characters array auspicious clouds,
Cinnabar script forms clustered groves.
Flying songs scatter through the vermilion forest,
In the profound vastness of the Great Desert,
Numinous tones sing of themselves,
Subtle words of the Eight Pure Palaces.
All heavens inhale golden fragrance,
Flowing essences bathe my countenance.
Spirit conjoins with the virtue of heaven and humanity,
The August Supreme descends with the Purple Youth,
Conveying me to soar through the Nine Voids,
Ascending to the Vermilion Moon Palace."*

When the incantation is complete, swallow qi twenty-four times. Then write in cinnabar above the purple script and wear it at the crown of the head. After three years, natural purple radiance will suffuse one’s form, and six Jade Maidens will be granted.

To recklessly divulge these numinous tones to three persons is to consign oneself to death at the hands of ghostly officials, to bind seven generations of ancestors in servitude, and to remain unredeemed for ten thousand kalpas.

Within a hundred years, if a Perfected One deigns to transmit this once, it is sufficient to attain divine transcendence and soar through the Highest Clarity.

---

On the Summer Solstice, the moon resides in the Cavern Yang Palace. The Cavern Yang Palace is the moon’s upper abode; at this time, the moon refines itself in the Flowing Fire Courtyard, smelting within the Eight Rays and growing resplendent in the Moon Soul.

On this day, infuse yellow qi into the Cavern Yang, and absorb yang essence into the Fire Palace. The Eight Pure Perfected Ones and all heavenly beings, on this day, gather from the Azure Void Forest to brush away the brilliance of the sun and moon. The moon, with yang essence, bathes the countenances of the heavenly beings.

Thus, on the Summer Solstice, when luminous qi excites yang essence, descending yin and absorbing the numinous, it is the moment when the Two Luminaries conjoin their radiance.

For those who seek the Dao of immortality: on the Summer Solstice at midnight, enter a chamber facing south, recline or sit as desired, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize the Cinnabar Radiance Lady of the Moon, whose surname is □ and given name □. Her form is eight inches and eight fen tall, her hair bound in a cascading cloud chignon, clad in a vermilion brocade flying skirt. She holds moonbeams in her mouth, descending into the Crimson Palace within one’s body.

Presently, the moonlight scatters into yellow qi. With each descent of a form, the Lady stands at the moon’s center, gathering azure void blossoms and scattering them amid the yellow qi. She exhales yang essence—yang essence is red—and bathes one’s form, from within to without. Yellow and red qi intertwine, illuminating the entire body.

The Lady bestows the six cinnabar characters of the purple script upon one’s body, then draws in yellow qi, swallowing it twenty-four times, and draws in yang essence twelve times before stopping. Strike the teeth twenty-four times and recite the incantation while looking upward:

*"Flowing Fire spans ten thousand leagues,
Essence of the Cavern Yang,
Abode of Yang’s Peace,
Triple Flower Jade City.
Golden immortals shine within,
Eight Pure and Fourfold Clarity,
Nine Luminaries descend their qi,
Primal Highest Numinous Ones.
The Lady inhales fragrance,
Scatters flowers in Jade Clarity.
Cinnabar script in purple characters,
Voices conjoined with the Azure Void.
Orchid pools and jade smoothness,
Flowing through the Eight Darknesses.
Vermilion radiance veils all,
Heavenly immortals grow resplendent.
Revolving dawn’s curved brilliance,
Illuminates and oversees my form.
To share life and death with the Vermilion Moon,
Riding the void, driving the flying chariot,
Jade Maidens flank my position,
Golden Lads assist my spirit.
Kingfisher plumes light the canopy,
Ascending to the Imperial Court."*

When the incantation is complete, swallow qi twenty-four times and saliva twenty times before stopping, then ingest the cinnabar characters of the purple script.

Practicing this Dao for eight years, the Lady will bestow upon one the true script of the cinnabar script, the moon’s jade pendants, enabling one to ascend and soar to the Cavern Yang Palace.

---

The cinnabar characters of the Moon Soul’s hidden tones are all inscribed in the Azure Void Forest of the moon’s southern realm, forming natural script. The Eight Pure Perfected Ones and all heavenly beings, on the Summer Solstice, gather and ingest these cinnabar characters of the purple script.

Those who ingest these six characters will share the same age as the Eight Pure, their nape bearing a circular luminosity that illumines the ten directions.

This method is most secret; the August Supreme Eight Pure Perfected Ones inscribe these tones within the Jade Chapters of the Eight Pure, thus forming the wondrous scripture of the Highest. To recklessly divulge these numinous tones is to consign seven generations of ancestors to punishment, to be cast into the Mountain of Knives, to suffer the trial of wind blades, and never to attain immortality.

---

On the Summer Solstice at midnight, write in vermilion on white paper and ingest it. Strike the teeth twelve times and softly recite the incantation:

*"Yang essence in the cinnabar pool,
Flowing Fire and swirling winds,
Golden chariots wing the void,
Mysterious radiance brushes the heavens.
Eight Pure gather orchids,
Scatter fragrance in the Jade Court.
Azure forests hang willows,
Wind stirs the jade branches.
Cinnabar script in purple characters,
Holding elegance and flourishing splendor.
Flowing fragrance bathes the essences,
Universally moistening without bound.
To share the mysterious radiance,
Equal in brilliance to the Purple Empyrean."*

When the incantation is complete, swallow qi twenty-four times, then write in cinnabar above the purple script and wear it at the crown of the head. After three years, the radiance of the sun and moon will illuminate one’s form, and the Moon Radiance Lady will bestow the true script, granting six Jade Maidens.

To recklessly transmit this to the unworthy is to consign seven generations of ancestors to punishment, never to be redeemed for ten thousand kalpas.

Secretly cultivating for eight years, cloud chariots will descend, and one will ascend to heaven in broad daylight, soaring through Jade Clarity.

---

The moon’s course circulates through the four quarters, thus it has phases of conjunction and opposition with the sun. The sun’s path is yang, the moon’s path is yin; though they revolve together, in their adornments, each resides in the four seasons.

Thus, the sun divides one hundred eighty days of yang, the moon divides one hundred eighty days of yin. Their cycles traverse three thousand six hundred degrees, and when they conjoin, yang qi excites while yin qi stagnates. When the Great Yang’s ninefold cycle completes its revolution, heaven and earth alter their lodgings, myriad plagues disperse, and evil and misfortune are eradicated.

Scholars who do not comprehend the revolutions of heaven and earth cannot escape the calamities of the Nine Yangs. Among those who accumulate learning, few attain the dragon chariot and ascend to the cloud towers. In vain do they labor in mountain caves, abstain from grains, swallow saliva, and ingest the essences of the sun and moon, yet remain ignorant of the divisions of the mysterious radiance—the vastness and narrowness of the celestial walled cities, the Seven Treasures and Vermilion Forests, the revolutions of the lodgings through the four quarters, the phases of waxing and waning.

The flying roots cannot be plucked, the imperial blossoms cannot be gathered. Yang essence will not descend, yin essence will not illumine. The Dao of the sun and moon remains distant indeed.

chunks.original_text: 若能勤寻其本，知有运度之景，城郭丘墟，朱林渊池，月中夫人姓字，则日月感降，亦无烦远求艰难之要，　自然得乘云舆飞轮，上造日月之门也。 紫书丹字，结於八素自然之气，高玄羽章，以生月中八骞之林，字有紫光，焕於月光之明。 八素真人及诸天，悉采八骞之林紫书丹字而服之，散香以拂日月之光也。 此音悉表大洞真经，故曰高上之文。 得服此字，面有金容，项负圆明，日月洞映，不学而仙也。 其法甚重，高上所秘，不得轻泄。 依科七百年内，若有金名东华，紫字上清，合真之人，听得三传。 自无此骨，秘之玉关，万劫不宣也。 右八炼金冶化仙真符，以立春之日，黄书青纸，投水中沐浴，则通身炼化，招日月之玄晖，降真人於玉庭。 并黄书青缯，佩身八年，与真人交言，降致云舆，飞升金门之上，受炼於金冶之池也。 右八炼丹胎玉符，以立夏之日正中，丹书黄纸上，投水中沐浴，则内外炼化，招飞根於阳精，致黄气於黄华，回日月以玄映，感真人於玉字。 又丹书黄缯，佩身八年，真人下降，授兆真文，飞空玄，上升洞阳之宫也。 右龙景九炼之符，以立秋之日晡时，青书白纸上，投水中沐浴，则骨髓炼变，招玄晖於紫景，致阳精於飞根，纳黄气於水母，降真人於紫轩。 又青书白缯，佩身八年，头有日圆之明，飞行太宫，上升广灵之堂。 右日魂炼精阴符，以立冬日夜半，墨书青纸上，投水中沐浴，一身血精并被炼化，致日精於紫景，降飞花於八骞，炼五府於玉池，运兆身於广寒。 又墨书青缯，佩身八年，身发金光，项有圆明，真人下降。 授兆真文，飞行太空，上升广寒之宫。 七星去地四十万里，围七百二十里，皆金精瑠璃为其城郭，七曜紫晖烙其光、其内则诸天人众真之游馆，广寒则其华盖也。 其一昼一夜，则运转周天一度也，亦如日月之轮。 其内亦生七宝朱林，如是人定之后，生气之初，七星受炼於广寒之宫，明鲜紫景於七曜之晖。 当此之时，七曜焕落，流精竟天，紫景吐津，以灌诸天，於是众真帝仙，皆以其时，莫不采七曜之晖，紫景之兰也。 凡上学之士，服日月之道，当修七曜之妙法。 每以人定之后，当於别室烧香、北首而卧，安身定神，弃绝异念，专心在灵，叩齿二十四通，存思七星焕明北方，己身卧於七星斗中华盖之下，七曜之光流焕紫景之外，冠覆於己身，己身在紫景之上七曜之中，内外郁冥，都无所见。 良久，豁除七曜之光，化为七童子，各在一星之上。 第一童子讳枢明，第二童子讳曜灵，第三童子讳北元，第四童子讳宝精，第五童子讳丹婴、第六童子讳虚清，第七童子讳紫瑛。 七童子吐七宝之光，以哺饴兆身。 枢明童子吐紫景之光，跃灵童子吐金精之光，北元童子吐瑠璃之光，宝精童子吐白银之光，丹婴童子吐玉精之光，虚清童子吐宝珠之光，紫瑛童子吐珊瑚之光。 七宝之光、同入兆身，便引气四十九咽，微咒曰： 金精凝化，结元七灵，紫曜焕落，朱景洞明、华盖徘徊、轮转寒庭，宝光熠熠，七跃婴婴，玄晖吐兰、芳芝流盈，夕寝灵馆、朝登玉清，璇玑运路，紫景翼形，宴辔云轮，策御飞軿，游盻八极，三道合并。 咒毕，咽液七过止，起以粟米之粉粉身，令匝而卧。

If one diligently seeks its root and comprehends the revolutions of the radiant degrees—knowing the celestial walled cities and earthly ruins, the Vermilion Forests and abyssal pools, the names and surnames of the Lady of the Moon—then the sun and moon will respond and descend, sparing one the arduous toil of distant seeking. Naturally, one may ride the cloud chariot and flying wheels to ascend to the gates of the sun and moon.

The purple script and cinnabar characters are bound within the spontaneous qi of the Eight Purities. The lofty and mysterious feathered chapters give life to the Eight Auspicious Forests of the moon, their characters suffused with purple radiance, gleaming brighter than the moon’s own light. The Eight Perfected of the Eight Purities and all the heavens gather the purple script and cinnabar characters from the Eight Auspicious Forests to ingest them, scattering incense to brush the light of the sun and moon. These sounds all express the *Great Cavern Perfected Scripture*, hence they are called the "exalted texts." Those who ingest these characters will bear a golden countenance, their necks crowned with circular luminosity; the sun and moon will illumine them through and through, and they shall ascend as immortals without study. This method is most solemn, a secret of the exalted ones, not to be lightly disclosed. According to the precepts, within seven hundred years, if one bears the golden name of Eastern Florescence and the purple characters of Supreme Purity, a person of true harmony, they may receive its threefold transmission. Without such destiny, it must be sealed within the Jade Gate, never to be revealed for ten thousand kalpas.

---

**Eightfold Refinement: Alchemical Transmutation of the Perfected Talisman**
On the day of the Beginning of Spring, inscribe in yellow upon blue paper and cast into water for bathing. The entire body will be refined and transformed, summoning the mysterious radiance of the sun and moon and descending the Perfected into the Jade Court. Also, inscribe in yellow upon blue silk and wear it on the body for eight years to converse with the Perfected, who will descend with cloud chariots, ascending above the Golden Gate to receive refinement in the Alchemical Pool.

---

**Eightfold Refinement: Elixir Embryo Jade Talisman**
At noon on the day of the Beginning of Summer, inscribe in cinnabar upon yellow paper and cast into water for bathing. Both inner and outer will be refined and transformed, summoning the flying roots from the yang essence and drawing forth yellow qi from the Yellow Blossoms, turning the sun and moon to mysterious illumination and evoking the Perfected within the Jade Characters. Also, inscribe in cinnabar upon yellow silk and wear it on the body for eight years; the Perfected will descend to bestow the true script upon the aspirant, who shall ascend through the void to the Cavern Yang Palace.

---

**Ninefold Refinement of the Dragon Radiance Talisman**
At the hour of *bu* on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, inscribe in blue upon white paper and cast into water for bathing. The bones and marrow will be refined and transformed, summoning the mysterious radiance from the Purple Radiance, drawing the yang essence to the flying roots, and gathering the yellow qi into the Water Mother, descending the Perfected into the Purple Pavilion. Also, inscribe in blue upon white silk and wear it on the body for eight years; one’s head will bear the circular luminosity of the sun, enabling flight through the Grand Palace to ascend to the Hall of Vast Numinosity.

---

**Sun Soul: Refinement of Yin Essence Talisman**
At midnight on the day of the Beginning of Winter, inscribe in ink upon blue paper and cast into water for bathing. The blood and essence of the entire body will be refined and transformed, drawing the solar essence into the Purple Radiance, descending flying blossoms upon the Eight Auspicious Forests, refining the Five Palaces in the Jade Pool, and transporting the aspirant’s body to the Palace of Vast Cold. Also, inscribe in ink upon blue silk and wear it on the body for eight years; the body will emit golden light, the neck crowned with circular luminosity, and the Perfected will descend to bestow the true script, enabling flight through the Grand Void to ascend to the Palace of Vast Cold.

The Seven Stars lie four hundred thousand *li* from the earth, encircling seven hundred and twenty *li*, their walled cities forged of golden essence and lapis lazuli. The Seven Luminaries cast their purple radiance, illuminating their interiors—palaces where the hosts of heavenly beings and Perfected roam. The Palace of Vast Cold is their canopy. In one day and night, they complete a single revolution around the heavens, just as the wheels of the sun and moon. Within them grow Seven Treasures and Vermilion Forests. When, after settling into meditation, the initial breath of life arises, the Seven Stars receive refinement in the Palace of Vast Cold, their purple radiance gleaming brightly amidst the luminaries’ glow. At this time, the Seven Luminaries blaze and scatter, their essence streaming across the heavens, while the purple radiance emits its nectar to irrigate all the heavens. Thus, all the Perfected and Divine Immortals, without exception, gather the radiance of the Seven Luminaries and the orchids of the purple radiance.

For scholars who ingest the Dao of the sun and moon, they must cultivate the wondrous methods of the Seven Luminaries. After settling into meditation, retire to a separate chamber, burn incense, lie with the head to the north, compose the body and stabilize the spirit, abandoning all stray thoughts. Focus the mind upon the numinous, knock the teeth twenty-four times, and visualize the Seven Stars blazing brightly in the north. Envision oneself lying beneath the canopy of the Dipper amidst the Seven Stars, the light of the Seven Luminaries streaming beyond the purple radiance, crowning one’s body. One’s body rests above the purple radiance and within the Seven Luminaries, all within and without shrouded in darkness, nothing visible. After a long while, the light of the Seven Luminaries parts, transforming into seven youths, each upon a star.

The first youth is named *Shuming*, the second *Yaoling*, the third *Beiyuan*, the fourth *Baojing*, the fifth *Danying*, the sixth *Xuqing*, and the seventh *Ziying*. The seven youths emit the light of the Seven Treasures to nourish one’s body. *Shuming* emits the light of the purple radiance, *Yueling* the light of golden essence, *Beiyuan* the light of lapis lazuli, *Baojing* the light of white silver, *Danying* the light of jade essence, *Xuqing* the light of precious pearls, and *Ziying* the light of coral. The light of the Seven Treasures enters one’s body together. Then, draw in the breath forty-nine times and softly recite the incantation:

*"Golden essence congeals and transforms,
Binding the seven numinous spirits.
Purple luminaries blaze and scatter,
Vermilion radiance illumines through.
Canopy sways, wheels turn in the cold court,
Treasure light gleams, seven youths leap and dance.
Mysterious radiance emits orchids,
Fragrant mushrooms overflow.
At dusk, repose in the numinous hall;
At dawn, ascend to Jade Purity.
The jade pivot turns the path,
Purple radiance wings the form.
Feast and rein the cloud wheels,
Whip and drive the flying chariot.
Gaze upon the eight poles,
Three paths converge as one."*

chunks.original_text: 高上命四司五帝及诸天王，遣监真领仙，恒履行五岳，及诸名山。 世间有三道之要，黄气阳精之法，丹书紫字之文，便列名於东华，奏札於金阙，以玉童玉女各七人，侍卫有经者身。 若轻泄灵音，替慢宝文，为玉童所奏，罚以五帝神兵，死役三涂五苦之中，七祖充责，万劫不原。 修行三道之要，当以月生三日、十五日、二十五日，一月三朝日月之光，夜半则朝七星之精，再拜心念，愿升三光之景，服御灵晖之容。 如此七年，则日月感降，授子神真之道也。 若有金名玉字，列奏玄图，应得此文，师当依盟对斋九十日，或二十七日，或三日； 弟子赍上金七两，黄纹四十尺，青缯三十二尺，告盟而传。 无盟轻泄，师被考没身，弟子轻窥天真，失盟刑残，七祖获罪，三掠不原。 天文妙重，紫书丹字甚秘，故以盟信宝之，不得轻传，学士被此之考，明慎之也。 如是灵经，生於太空之内，书於玄圃之上，积石之阴，金堂玉室之裹。 灵文焕曜，紫字郁霄，神童翼灵，玉女散香，各三千人侍卫神真。 南极上元君受之於高上，投盟於太空，以传太微天帝君，天帝君传西龟王母，王母传金阙帝君，帝君以付上相青童君，使授后学得为真人者。 今封一通於西城山。 凡学仙不修此道，徒勤感真，正可得下仙，不死而已，望披天关登金阙，永无由也。 既御三道，修行八炼，纵不得白日飞腾，隐化之日自然即变，上升金门四乡之宫，更受炼於玉池，得给金翅之羽服，上登金阙之宫。 故此法高妙，不与凡经齐伦，有得其文，不学自仙也。 中皇仙人、玄子生、墨翟子、赵延甫、宁康伯、彭鉴、安期、帛高之徒七百人，寻道履苦，情贯玉虚，虽腾身霄崖，游盘五岳，不得三道之要，故不得上登金门之内，受谒金阙之格，今由飙身云虚，为玉清策辔，司迎上真，何异始学勤苦下世，望登云阙之游乎。 如苏子林、谷希子、幼阳君、王乔、赤松、皇人、青真之徒，始学便修三道之要，黄气阳精丹书紫字之法，便得超凌三清，登青华之宫，更受上品妙经，诣金阙受号，位登玉清上真四极之任，如此岂不异於有志乎。 王君以经传南岳夫人，今封於阳浴宫南洞之室，有志者勤寻其文。 上清黄气阳精三道顺行经竟 #1按《正统道藏》原本，在此文后忽插入十个版面，共计五十行错简，其文字内容为《太上说真武本传神咒妙经》，与本篇无关。 今姑且保存《道藏》本原样。 #2《道藏》原本错简止於此。 #3以下经文接前错简断处。

The Supreme One commanded the Four Directors, the Five Emperors, and the various Heavenly Kings to dispatch the Inspectors of Perfected Immortals, who perpetually traverse the Five Marchmounts and all renowned mountains. In the world, there are the essentials of the Three Ways—the method of the Yellow Qi and Yang Essence, and the scriptures of cinnabar writing in purple characters. Those who possess these are listed in the Eastern Flower, their names memorialized in the Golden Portal, and seven jade lads and seven jade maidens each attend the body of those who hold the scriptures.

Should one lightly divulge the numinous sounds or neglect the precious texts, the jade lads will report this, and the Five Emperors’ divine soldiers will punish them, condemning them to death and servitude amidst the Three Paths and Five Sufferings. Their seven generations of ancestors will bear the blame, and for ten thousand kalpas, there shall be no deliverance. Those who cultivate the essentials of the Three Ways must, on the third, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the lunar month—three days each month—face the light of the sun and moon. At midnight, they pay homage to the essence of the Seven Stars, bowing twice and concentrating their minds, aspiring to ascend to the radiance of the Three Luminaries and partake of the divine splendor of their countenances. After seven years of such practice, the sun and moon will respond and descend, bestowing upon them the Dao of the Divine Perfected.

If one’s name is inscribed in gold and jade and recorded in the Mysterious Chart, and one is deemed worthy of receiving this scripture, the master must observe the covenant with a fast of ninety days, or twenty-seven days, or three days. The disciple shall present seven taels of gold, forty feet of yellow silk, and thirty-two feet of blue silk, and the transmission shall proceed after the oath is sworn. Without the covenant, to lightly divulge it will subject the master to interrogation and the forfeiture of their body, while the disciple, for glimpsing the celestial perfected, will violate the covenant and suffer mutilation. Their seven generations of ancestors will incur guilt, and for three trials, there shall be no deliverance.

The celestial writings are wondrous and weighty; the cinnabar script in purple characters is most secret. Thus, it is treasured with covenantal faith and must not be lightly transmitted. Scholars who suffer this interrogation must be prudent and reverent. This numinous scripture was born within the Great Void, inscribed upon the Dark Garden above, in the shade of the Piled Stones, within the golden halls and jade chambers. The numinous text shines brilliantly, its purple characters soaring through the clouds, while three thousand divine lads and three thousand jade maidens, wielding incense, attend the divine perfected.

The Supreme Primordial Sovereign of the Southern Culmen received it from the Supreme One and cast the covenant into the Great Void, transmitting it to the Celestial Emperor of the Grand Tenuity. The Celestial Emperor transmitted it to the Queen Mother of the Western Tortoise, who passed it to the Emperor of the Golden Portal. The Emperor entrusted it to the Azure Lad of the Highest Minister, who was to transmit it to later scholars worthy of becoming perfected immortals. Now, one copy is sealed within the Western City Mountain.

Those who study immortality but do not cultivate this Way labor in vain to summon the perfected. They may attain only lesser immortality and escape death, but to hope to unlock the Celestial Gate and ascend to the Golden Portal shall forever remain beyond their reach. Once one masters the Three Ways and practices the Eight Refinements, even if one does not achieve ascension in broad daylight, on the day of transformation, one will naturally ascend to the Golden Gate and the palaces of the Four Quarters. There, one shall undergo further refinement in the Jade Pool, receive the feathered raiment of golden wings, and ascend to the palace of the Golden Portal.

Thus, this method is lofty and wondrous, incomparable to ordinary scriptures. Those who obtain its text shall become immortals without even practicing it. The immortals Zhonghuang, Xuanzisheng, Mo Di, Zhao Yanfu, Ning Kangbo, Peng Jian, An Qi, and Bogao, along with seven hundred others, sought the Dao and endured hardships, their devotion reaching the Jade Void. Though they soared to the cliffs of the heavens and roamed the Five Marchmounts, they did not obtain the essentials of the Three Ways and thus could not ascend within the Golden Gate or receive the protocols of the Golden Portal. Now, they ride the winds through the empty clouds, serving as charioteers for the Jade Clarity and escorts for the highest perfected—how different is this from those who, in their early studies, toil in the lower realms yet aspire to wander the Cloudy Portal?

In contrast, Su Zilin, Gu Xizi, Youyang Jun, Wang Qiao, Chisong, Huangren, and Qingzhen, from the outset of their studies, cultivated the essentials of the Three Ways—the method of the Yellow Qi and Yang Essence, and the cinnabar script in purple characters. Thus, they swiftly transcended the Three Clarities, ascended to the Palace of Azure Flower, and received the wondrous scriptures of the highest grade. They journeyed to the Golden Portal to receive their titles, attaining the rank of the highest perfected immortals of the Jade Clarity and the Four Poles. How different is this from those of mere aspiration?

The Perfected King transmitted this scripture to the Lady of the Southern Marchmount, and it is now sealed within the chamber of the Southern Grotto of the Yang Bathing Palace. Those with aspiration should diligently seek its text.

The *Scripture of the Yellow Qi, Yang Essence, and Three Ways in Sequential Practice* concludes.
